<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>ResourceManagementUtahUpgrade</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var start = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Starting of ResourceManagementUtahUpgrade , time : "+start);
var rmUtahUpgrade = new ResourceManagementUtahUpgrade(); rmUtahUpgrade.removeMandatoryForUsersOnAllocationsTable(); rmUtahUpgrade.addChoiceValueToResourceTypeFieldOnResourcePlan();
var end = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Ending of ResourceManagementUtahUpgrade , time : "+end); gs.log("Total time taken for ResourceManagementUtahUpgrade in millisecs : "+(end.getNumericValue() - start.getNumericValue()));]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-11-14 18:17:54</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a9730f9b774f1110ffca78847a5a9926</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ResourceManagementUtahUpgrade</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Resource Management" source="com.snc.resource_management">7200da2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d438e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a9730f9b774f1110ffca78847a5a9926</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-11-15 09:30:25</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
